casebody.data:
99-0457 (La. 4/1/99)

Calvin TALLEY and Mary Talley v. BLUE CROSS/BLUE SHIELD OF LOUISIANA. No. 99-CC-0457. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Talley, Calvin; Talley, Mary;.— Plaintiffs); Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs; Parish of Lafayette 15th Judicial District Court Div. “J” Number 96-5534; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number CW98-1939

Denied.

KIMBALL, J. not on panel; recused.
